job_tasks.phrase: coordinate all the activities related to developing new exams
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the need to oversee and manage the development process, which requires understanding the business objectives for new exams.

job_tasks.phrase: translating existing exams to several different languages
job_tasks.justification: Localization of exams implies understanding the business need for wider market reach and adapting content accordingly.

job_tasks.phrase: updating the exams to current standards during maintenance
job_tasks.justification: Keeping exams current with standards shows an understanding of the business need for relevant and up-to-date certifications.

job_tasks.phrase: implementing exam products in the various systems
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding how exam products fit into existing business systems and workflows.

job_tasks.phrase: review the quality of the exams through item and test analysis
job_tasks.justification: Quality review through analysis is tied to business goals of providing reliable and valid assessments.

job_tasks.phrase: work on all exams that form part of EXIN's certification portfolio
job_tasks.justification: This shows an understanding of the broader business portfolio and the role of exams within it.

job_tasks.phrase: collaborate closely with the Exam Developers to integrate generative AI solutions into our processes
job_tasks.justification: Integrating AI solutions into business processes requires understanding business needs and how AI can address them.

job_tasks.phrase: translate internal guidelines into machine learning algorithms
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to the creation or adaptation of machine learning algorithms, a core aspect of modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: implementing exam products in the various systems
job_tasks.justification: This implies software integration and deployment into existing systems.

job_tasks.phrase: maintaining legal, qualitative and ethical compliance in the outcomes
job_tasks.justification: Ensuring compliance and quality in operational outcomes relates to operational engineering and responsible AI deployment.

job_tasks.phrase: review the quality of the exams through item and test analysis
job_tasks.justification: Item and test analysis often involves processing and analyzing data related to exam performance, which falls under data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Independently writing and maintaining machine learning algorithms complying with standards, best practices and company policies
job_tasks.justification: Writing and maintaining algorithms can involve software development practices to ensure they are production-ready and adhere to standards.

job_tasks.phrase: Detecting (using test analysis) and resolving issues related to the exam products, and performing root cause analyses to take corrective actions
job_tasks.justification: Issue detection, root cause analysis, and corrective actions are key components of operations and maintenance in a product lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: Coordinating work with subject matter experts and cooperating with third parties in creating, localizing, implementing and maintaining exam products
job_tasks.justification: While coordination is business, the 'creating, localizing, implementing and maintaining' of products can involve data preparation and pipeline management.

job_tasks.phrase: (Co)developing and improving exam products in line with guidelines for educational measurement
job_tasks.justification: Developing and improving products can involve software engineering practices, especially when integrating new methodologies.

job_tasks.phrase: Testing exam products (exams and corresponding materials) for the other team members
job_tasks.justification: Testing often involves data validation and ensuring data integrity, which relates to data engineering.

soft_skills.phrase: coordinate all the activities related to developing new exams
collaborate closely with the Exam Developers
Coordinating work with subject matter experts and cooperating with third parties
stay up to date with the latest research and developments in the field of AI and machine learning
Keeping your knowledge in the domain up-to-date
maintaining legal, qualitative and ethical compliance in the outcomes
review the quality of the exams through item and test analysis
Detecting (using test analysis) and resolving issues related to the exam products, and performing root cause analyses to take corrective actions
translate internal guidelines into machine learning algorithms
Independently writing and maintaining machine learning algorithms

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on exam development, coordination, and quality assurance. While it mentions integrating generative AI and translating guidelines into machine learning algorithms, these appear to be supportive tasks within a broader exam development context, rather than the core focus of building and deploying AI-driven applications.
